verses.verse: I am telling <S%G3004><s%> the truth <S%G225><s%> in Christ, <S%G5547><s%> I am not lying, <S%G5574><s%> my conscience <S%G4893><s%> bearing <S%G4828><s%> me witness <S%G4828><s%> in the Holy <S%G40><s%> Spirit, <S%G4151><s%>
that I have great <S%G3173><s%> sorrow <S%G3077><s%> and unceasing <S%G88><s%> grief <S%G3601><s%> in my heart. <S%G2588><s%>

For I could wish <S%G2172><s%> that I myself <S%G846><s%> were accursed, <S%G331><s%> [separated] from Christ <S%G5547><s%> for the sake <S%G5228><s%> of my brethren, <S%G80><s%> my kinsmen <S%G4773><s%> according <S%G2596><s%> to the flesh, <S%G4561><s%>

who <S%G3748><s%> are Israelites, <S%G2475><s%> to whom <S%G3739><s%> belongs the adoption <S%G5206><s%> as sons <S%G5206><s%> and the glory <S%G1391><s%> and the covenants <S%G1242><s%> and the giving <S%G3548><s%> of the Law <S%G3548><s%> and the [temple] service <S%G2999><s%> and the promises, <S%G1860><s%>

whose <S%G3739><s%> are the fathers, <S%G3962><s%> and from whom <S%G3739><s%> is the Christ <S%G5547><s%> according <S%G2596><s%> to the flesh, <S%G4561><s%> who is over <S%G1909><s%> all, <S%G3956><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> blessed <S%G2128><s%> forever. <S%G165><s%> Amen. <S%G281><s%>

But [it is] not as though <S%G3754><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> has failed. <S%G1601><s%> For they are not all <S%G3956><s%> Israel <S%G2274><s%> who <S%G3588><s%> are [descended] from Israel; <S%G2274><s%>

neither <S%G3761><s%> are they all <S%G3956><s%> children <S%G5043><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> they are Abraham's descendants, <S%G4690><s%> but: "through <S%G1722><s%> Isaac <S%G2464><s%> your descendants <S%G4690><s%> will be named. <S%G2564><s%>"

That is, it is not the children <S%G5043><s%> of the flesh <S%G4561><s%> who <S%G3778><s%> are children <S%G5043><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> but the children <S%G5043><s%> of the promise <S%G1860><s%> are regarded <S%G3049><s%> as descendants. <S%G4690><s%>
For this <S%G3778><s%> is a word <S%G3056><s%> of promise: <S%G1860><s%> "At this <S%G3778><s%> time <S%G2540><s%> I will come, <S%G2064><s%> and Sarah <S%G4564><s%> shall have a son. <S%G5207><s%>"

And not only <S%G3440><s%> this, but there was Rebekah <S%G4479><s%> also, <S%G2532><s%> when she had conceived <S%G2845><s%> <S%G2192><s%> [twins] by one <S%G1520><s%> man, <S%G1520><s%> our father <S%G3962><s%> Isaac; <S%G2464><s%>

for though [the twins] were not yet <S%G3380><s%> born, <S%G1080><s%> and had not done <S%G4238><s%> anything <S%G5100><s%> good <S%G18><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> bad, <S%G5337><s%> in order <S%G2443><s%> that God's purpose <S%G4286><s%> according <S%G2596><s%> to [His] choice <S%G1589><s%> might stand, <S%G3306><s%> not because <S%G1537><s%> of works, <S%G2041><s%> but because <S%G1537><s%> of Him who calls, <S%G2564><s%>
it was said <S%G3004><s%> to her, "The older <S%G3173><s%> will serve <S%G1398><s%> the younger. <S%G1640><s%>"
Just <S%G2509><s%> as it is written, <S%G1125><s%> "Jacob <S%G2384><s%> I loved, <S%G25><s%> but Esau <S%G2269><s%> I hated. <S%G3404><s%>"
What <S%G5101><s%> shall we say <S%G3004><s%> then <S%G3767><s%>? There is no <S%G3361><s%> injustice <S%G93><s%> with God, <S%G2316><s%> is there? May it never <S%G3361><s%> be!

For He says <S%G3004><s%> to Moses, <S%G3475><s%> "I will have <S%G1653><s%> mercy <S%G1653><s%> on whom <S%G3739><s%> I have <S%G1653><s%> mercy, <S%G1653><s%> and I will have <S%G3627><s%> compassion <S%G3627><s%> on whom <S%G3739><s%> I have <S%G3627><s%> compassion. <S%G3627><s%>"

So <S%G686><s%> then <S%G686><s%> it [does] not [depend] on the man who wills <S%G2309><s%> or <S%G3761><s%> the man who runs, <S%G5143><s%> but on God <S%G2316><s%> who has <S%G1653><s%> mercy. <S%G1653><s%>

For the Scripture <S%G1124><s%> says <S%G3004><s%> to Pharaoh, <S%G5328><s%> "For this <S%G3778><s%> very <S%G846><s%> purpose I raised <S%G1825><s%> you up, to demonstrate <S%G1731><s%> My power <S%G1411><s%> in you, and that My name <S%G3686><s%> might be proclaimed <S%G1229><s%> throughout <S%G1722><s%> the whole <S%G3956><s%> earth. <S%G1093><s%>"
So <S%G686><s%> then <S%G686><s%> He has <S%G1653><s%> mercy <S%G1653><s%> on whom <S%G3739><s%> He desires, <S%G2309><s%> and He hardens <S%G4645><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> He desires. <S%G2309><s%>

You will say <S%G3004><s%> to me then, <S%G3767><s%> "Why <S%G5101><s%> does He still <S%G2089><s%> find <S%G3201><s%> fault <S%G3201><s%>? For who <S%G5101><s%> resists <S%G436><s%> His will <S%G1013><s%>?"

On the contrary, <S%G3304><s%> who <S%G5101><s%> are you, O <S%G5599><s%> man, <S%G444><s%> who answers <S%G470><s%> back <S%G470><s%> to God <S%G2316><s%>? The thing <S%G4110><s%> molded <S%G4110><s%> will not say <S%G3004><s%> to the molder, <S%G4111><s%> "Why <S%G5101><s%> did you make <S%G4160><s%> me like <S%G3779><s%> this, <S%G3779><s%>" will it?

Or <S%G2228><s%> does not the potter <S%G2763><s%> have <S%G2192><s%> a right <S%G1849><s%> over the clay, <S%G4081><s%> to make <S%G4160><s%> from the same <S%G846><s%> lump <S%G5445><s%> one <S%G3739><s%> <S%G3303><s%> vessel <S%G4632><s%> for honorable <S%G5092><s%> use, <S%G5092><s%> and another <S%G3739><s%> <S%G1161><s%> for common <S%G819><s%> use <S%G819><s%>?

What <S%G1161><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> although willing <S%G2309><s%> to demonstrate <S%G1731><s%> His wrath <S%G3709><s%> and to make <S%G1107><s%> His power <S%G1415><s%> known, <S%G1107><s%> endured <S%G5342><s%> with much <S%G4183><s%> patience <S%G3115><s%> vessels <S%G4632><s%> of wrath <S%G3709><s%> prepared <S%G2675><s%> for destruction <S%G684><s%>?

And [He did so] in order <S%G2443><s%> that He might make <S%G1107><s%> known <S%G1107><s%> the riches <S%G4149><s%> of His glory <S%G1391><s%> upon vessels <S%G4632><s%> of mercy, <S%G1656><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> He prepared <S%G4282><s%> beforehand <S%G4282><s%> for glory, <S%G1391><s%>

[even] us, whom <S%G3739><s%> He also <S%G2532><s%> called, <S%G2564><s%> not from among <S%G1537><s%> Jews <S%G2453><s%> only, <S%G3440><s%> but also <S%G2532><s%> from among <S%G1537><s%> Gentiles. <S%G1484><s%>

As He says <S%G3004><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> in Hosea, <S%G5617><s%> "I will call <S%G2564><s%> those <S%G3588><s%> who were not My people, <S%G2992><s%> 'My people, <S%G2992><s%>' And her who was not beloved, <S%G25><s%> 'beloved. <S%G25><s%>'"

"And it shall be that in the place <S%G5117><s%> where <S%G3757><s%> it was said <S%G3004><s%> to them, 'you are not My people, <S%G2992><s%>' There <S%G1563><s%> they shall be called <S%G2564><s%> sons <S%G5207><s%> of the living <S%G2198><s%> God. <S%G2316><s%>"

And Isaiah <S%G2268><s%> cries <S%G2896><s%> out concerning <S%G5228><s%> Israel, <S%G2474><s%> "Though <S%G1437><s%> the number <S%G706><s%> of the sons <S%G5207><s%> of Israel <S%G2274><s%> be as the sand <S%G285><s%> of the sea, <S%G2281><s%> it is the remnant <S%G5275><s%> that will be saved; <S%G4982><s%>
for the Lord <S%G2962><s%> will execute <S%G4160><s%> His word <S%G3056><s%> upon the earth, <S%G1093><s%> thoroughly <S%G4931><s%> and quickly. <S%G4932><s%> "

And just <S%G2531><s%> as Isaiah <S%G2268><s%> foretold, <S%G4275><s%> "Except <S%G1508><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> of Sabaoth <S%G4519><s%> had left <S%G1459><s%> to us a posterity, <S%G4690><s%> We would have become <S%G1096><s%> as Sodom, <S%G4670><s%> and would have resembled <S%G3666><s%> Gomorrah. <S%G1116><s%>"

What <S%G5101><s%> shall we say <S%G3004><s%> then <S%G3767><s%>? That Gentiles, <S%G1484><s%> who did not pursue <S%G1377><s%> righteousness, <S%G1343><s%> attained <S%G2638><s%> righteousness, <S%G1343><s%> even <S%G1161><s%> the righteousness <S%G1343><s%> which is by faith; <S%G4102><s%>
but Israel, <S%G2474><s%> pursuing <S%G1377><s%> a law <S%G3551><s%> of righteousness, <S%G1343><s%> did not arrive <S%G5348><s%> at [that] law. <S%G3551><s%>

Why <S%G1223><s%> <S%G5101><s%>? Because <S%G3754><s%> [they did] not [pursue it] by faith, <S%G4102><s%> but as though <S%G5613><s%> [it were] by works. <S%G2041><s%> They stumbled <S%G4350><s%> over <S%G4350><s%> the stumbling <S%G4348><s%> stone, <S%G3037><s%>

just <S%G2531><s%> as it is written, <S%G1125><s%> "Behold, <S%G2400><s%> I lay <S%G5087><s%> in Zion <S%G4622><s%> a stone <S%G3037><s%> of stumbling <S%G4348><s%> and a rock <S%G4073><s%> of offense, <S%G4625><s%> And he who believes <S%G4100><s%> in Him will not be disappointed. <S%G2617><s%>"
